channel.title: Could someone alter the Runescape logo for me?
channel.description:
Hey, I've tried with what skills I have with GIMP (very little) to edit the Runescape banner, as I'm creating a website for my server. If someone with more skills possibly change this for me? It'll be greatly appreciated and can be 're-payed' with and Website Development work or help.
http://www.runescape.com/img/main/splash/splash1/logo.png?1
I'd like the, 'Runescape' to say 'EclipseRuins'
and the 'The World's Greatest Adventure' to say 'Play Til' You Drop'
Thanks to anyone that can give me anything close to that!
